column3: if (TIFR3 & (1 << OCF3A)) {\\n    TIFR3 = 1 << OCF3A;\\n    /* on OCR3A match */\\n}
if (TIFR3 & (1 << OCF3B)) {\\n    TIFR3 = 1 << OCF3B;\\n    /* on OCR3B match */\\n}
if (TIFR3 & (1 << OCF3C)) {\\n    TIFR3 = 1 << OCF3C;\\n    /* on OCR3C match */\\n}
if (TIFR3 & (1 << TOV3)) {\\n    TIFR3 = 1 << TOV3;\\n    /* on overflow */\\n}
if (TIFR3 & (1 << ICF3)) {\\n    TIFR3 = 1 << ICF3;\\n    /* on capture */\\n}
